channel.title: CVE Feed for simpleledger -- slpjs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for simpleledger -- slpjs

item.title: CVE-2020-11071|2024-08-04T11:21:14.616Z -- simpleledger -- slpjs
item.description: SLPJS (npm package slpjs) before version 0.27.2, has a vulnerability where users could experience false-negative validation outcomes for MINT transaction operations. A poorly implemented SLP wallet could allow spending of the affected tokens which would result in the destruction of a user's minting baton. This is fixed in version 0.27.2.

item.title: CVE-2020-15130|2024-08-04T13:08:22.292Z -- simpleledger -- slpjs
item.description: In SLPJS (npm package slpjs) before version 0.27.4, there is a vulnerability to false-positive validation outcomes for the NFT1 Child Genesis transaction type. A poorly implemented SLP wallet or opportunistic attacker could create a seemingly valid NFT1 child token without burning any of the NFT1 Group token type as is required by the NFT1 specification. This is fixed in version 0.27.4.
